definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
precious horses and magnificent carriage (idiom); rich family with extravagant lifestyle/ostentatious display of luxury
magnificent carriage and precious horses (idiom); rich family with extravagant lifestyle/ostentatious display of luxury

sentences.english: BMW still trails Audi as the top luxury car brand in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，寶馬依然不敵奧迪頭號豪華車品牌的地位。

sentences.english: The Z8 held BMW's production car performance records for several years.
sentences.chinese: 幾年來舉行的寶馬生產的汽車的性能記錄的Z8。

sentences.english: Fly to Munich and stay at Bauma Exhibition, or return to China.
sentences.chinese: 飛往慕尼黑參加寶馬展，或返回中國。

sentences.english: That was until I approached this bunch of generous private owners on the BMW forum.
sentences.chinese: 那直到我接近這羣大量的私人業主寶馬論壇。

sentences.english: The BMW i8 concept also appeared at the sneak preview.
sentences.chinese: 寶馬i8概念車也亮相預展。

sentences.english: BMW is really a little bit and Xiali, taste is different.
sentences.chinese: 真的有點寶馬與夏利，味道就是不同。

sentences.english: BMW is coy about how many 1-Series it expects to sell.
sentences.chinese: 對於預期銷售多少1系列車，寶馬沒有明說。

sentences.english: He just bought a new beemer. (B. M. Wcar)
sentences.chinese: 他剛買了一輛新的寶馬車。

sentences.english: That girl is driving a beemer.
Words just export, LiuJianMin is driving a BMW parked in front of three people.
sentences.chinese: 話剛出口，劉建民開着一輛寶馬停在三人面前。

sentences.english: If I am not mistaken, BMW used to be famous for its 6-cylinder engine.
sentences.chinese: 如果我沒弄錯的話，寶馬以前的6缸引擎很出名。

sentences.english: Yes. you guessed it right, this Beemer runs on hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 是的，你猜對了，這是一款以氫爲能源的寶馬車。

sentences.english: Look that red BMW X6. It's my new car.
sentences.chinese: 看那輛紅色寶馬x6，是我的新車。

sentences.english: I have been in the BMW Sauber garage and could not believe what I saw.
sentences.chinese: 我去了寶馬車隊的車房，簡直不敢相信自己的眼睛。

sentences.english: A car made of bricks is displayed on street in Jiangyin, a city of east China's Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 江蘇省江陰街上，展示了一輛磚砌寶馬車。

sentences.english: This is in response to China's probes on monopolistic behaviour in the car industry.
sentences.chinese: 寶馬公司此舉是對於中國反壟斷調查事件的迴應。

definition: racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
one's own car (or motorbike)/vehicle for one's private use
enclosed carriage for carrying passengers/motor carriage/car or bus/limousine/CL:部[bu4],輛|辆[liang4]
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
